review: Super easy to use. Need Google to continue with providing the promised apps. When that happens I'll give it five stars.
author: BZ "silverzd"

review: The Google Chromecast by itself works just fine.  It's the providers that make it difficult to use.  I only use it to stream to a new TV that doesn't have a VGA input.  So I either need a new computer with HDMI output or get cable...whatever.  Netflix works perfectly, their app lets you choose to watch on your computer or stream.  Hulu's new "I work with Chromecast" probably works on everything except a PC.  Their customer support can't seem to understand why I only have a PC.  Streaming TV show is a good as watching on your laptop as long as you have good enough wireless to support it.
author: Hokey Smokes

review: I received this as a birthday gift and it's wonderful.  I had no idea something like this existed.  We are now able to watch Netflix and Youtube videos on our regular TV without having to use our Xbox.  It's much more convenient and at a wonderful price.
author: Amber Davis

review: in today's world where everyone has a cell phone or should I say smart phone, we need a way to transfer what we're watching as far as YouTube and movies to watch television. This device is very inexpensive and does it seemlessly!!  setting it up takes less than a minute. You just download the Chrome cast app and follow a few steps. It's basically plug n play. I bought one for my house and my girlfriends house and its worth every penny!
author: Michael

review: Now that Hulu+ is available with chromecast, this allowed me to finally cut the cord to my $120 satellite bill.  Don't miss it AT ALL.

review: Product works great as advertised.Note: Your wireless router however has to be set to DHCP to use the device.
